steps.title: â€œGraduate nurseâ€
steps.content: â€œGraduate nurseâ€ In the medical field, a graduate nurse (GN) is someone who has graduated from a nursing degree program but has not completed the requirements to become a registered nurse (RN). Depending on the state and employer, a GN can work in a clinical setting under the direct supervision of a RN. [3] X Research source
